abstract: Slip dresses that resemble lingerie are latest trend in women's clothing.
lead_paragraph: Boudoir looks were all over the spring 2016 runways. You’ll need to make a few adjustments to translate them into real life.

headline.main: How to Wear Lingerie Outside the Bedroom (Hint: Own It)
